00023 namespace co

00025 namespace base

00027 #ifdef EQ_GCC_4_1_OR_LATER
00028 
00038 template <typename T> class Atomic
00039 {
00040 public:
00042     explicit Atomic( const T v = 0 )
00043             : _value(v)
00044     {}
00045 
00047     explicit Atomic( const Atomic< T >& v )
00048             : _value( v._value )
00049     {}
00050 
00052     operator T(void) const
00053     {
00054         return __sync_fetch_and_add(&_value, 0);
00055     }
00056 
00058     void operator = ( const T v )
00059     {
00060         _value = v;
00061         __sync_synchronize();
00062     }
00063 
00065     void operator = ( const Atomic< T >& v)
00066     {
00067         _value = v._value;
00068         __sync_synchronize();
00069     }
00070 
00072     T operator +=(T v)
00073     {
00074         return __sync_add_and_fetch(&_value, v);
00075     }
00076 
00078     T operator -=(T v)
00079     {
00080         return __sync_sub_and_fetch(&_value, v);
00081     }
00082 
00084     T operator ++(void)
00085     {
00086         return __sync_add_and_fetch(&_value, 1);
00087     }
00088 
00090     T operator --(void)
00091     {
00092         return __sync_sub_and_fetch(&_value, 1);
00093     }
00094 
00096     T operator ++(int)
00097     {
00098         return __sync_fetch_and_add(&_value, 1);
00099     }
00100 
00102     T operator --(int)
00103     {
00104         return __sync_fetch_and_sub(&_value, 1);
00105     }
00106 
00107 private:
00108     mutable T _value;
00109 };
00110 
00111 #elif defined(__GLIBCPP__) || defined(__GLIBCXX__)
00112 
00113 template <typename T> class Atomic
00114 {
00115 public:
00116     explicit Atomic( T v = 0 ) : _value(v) {}
00117     explicit Atomic( const Atomic< T >& v ) : _value( v._value ) {}
00118 
00119     operator T(void) const
00120     {
00121         return __gnu_cxx::__exchange_and_add(&_value, 0);
00122     }
00123 
00124     void operator = ( const T v ) { _value = v; }
00125     void operator = ( const Atomic< T >& v ) { _value = v._value; }
00126 
00127     T operator +=(T v)
00128     {
00129         return __gnu_cxx::__exchange_and_add(&_value, v) + v;
00130     }
00131 
00132     T operator -=(T v)
00133     {
00134         return __gnu_cxx::__exchange_and_add(&_value, -v) - v;
00135     }
00136 
00137     /* prefix operator */
00138     T operator ++(void)
00139     {
00140         return operator+=(1);
00141     }
00142 
00143     /* prefix operator */
00144     T operator --(void)
00145     {
00146         return operator-=(1);
00147     }
00148 
00149     /* postfix operator */
00150     T operator ++(int)
00151     {
00152         return __gnu_cxx::__exchange_and_add(&_value, 1);
00153     }
00154 
00155     /* postfix operator */
00156     T operator --(int)
00157     {
00158         return __gnu_cxx::__exchange_and_add(&_value, -1);
00159     }
00160 
00161 private:
00162     mutable _Atomic_word _value;
00163 };
00164 
00165 #elif defined (EQ_HAS_COMPARE_AND_SWAP) /* emulate via compareAndSwap */
00166 
00167 template <typename T> class Atomic
00168 {
00169 public:
00170     explicit Atomic( const T v ) { *this = v; }
00171     explicit Atomic( const Atomic< T >& v ) { *this = v; }
00172     explicit Atomic( ) { *this = 0; }
00173     
00174     operator T(void) const
00175     {
00176         memoryBarrier();
00177         return _value;
00178     }
00179 
00180     void operator = ( const T v )
00181     {
00182         _value = v;
00183         memoryBarrier();
00184     }
00185 
00186     void operator = ( const Atomic< T >& v )
00187     {
00188         _value = v._value;
00189         memoryBarrier();
00190     }
00191 
00192     /* prefix operator */
00193     T operator ++()
00194     {
00195         return *this += 1;
00196     }
00197 
00198     /* prefix operator */
00199     T operator --()
00200     {
00201         return *this -= 1;
00202     }
00203 
00204     T operator +=(T v)
00205     {
00206         for(;;)
00207         {
00208             T oldv = _value;
00209             T newv = oldv+v;
00210             if(compareAndSwap(&_value,oldv,newv))
00211                 return newv;
00212         }
00213     }
00214 
00215     T operator -=(T v)
00216     {
00217         for(;;)
00218         {
00219             T oldv = _value;
00220             T newv = oldv-v;
00221             if(compareAndSwap(&_value,oldv,newv))
00222                 return newv;
00223         }
00224     }
00225 
00226     /* postfix operator */
00227     T operator ++(int)
00228     {
00229         for(;;)
00230         {
00231             T oldv = _value;
00232             if(compareAndSwap(&_value,oldv,oldv+1))
00233                 return oldv;
00234         }
00235     }
00236 
00237     /* postfix operator */
00238     T operator --(int)
00239     {
00240         for(;;)
00241         {
00242             T oldv = _value;
00243             if(compareAndSwap(&_value,oldv,oldv-1))
00244                 return oldv;
00245         }
00246     }
00247 
00248 private:
00249     T _value;
00250 };
00251 
00252 #else
00253 #  warning ("Atomic emulation")
00254 #  include <co/base/lock.h>       // used in inline methods
00255 
00256 template <typename T>
00257 class Atomic: public NonCopyable
00258 {
00259 public:
00260     explicit Atomic(T v = 0)
00261     {
00262         *this = v;
00263     }
00264 
00265     operator T(void) const
00266     {
00267         return _value;
00268     }
00269 
00270     void operator =(T v)
00271     {
00272         _lock.set();
00273         _value = v;
00274         _lock.unset();
00275     }
00276 
00277     /* prefix operator */
00278     T operator ++()
00279     {
00280         return *this += 1;
00281     }
00282 
00283     /* prefix operator */
00284     T operator --()
00285     {
00286         return *this -= 1;
00287     }
00288 
00289     T operator +=(T v)
00290     {
00291         _lock.set();
00292         _value += v;
00293         T newv = _value;
00294         _lock.unset();
00295 
00296         return newv;
00297     }
00298 
00299     T operator -=(T v)
00300     {
00301         _lock.set();
00302         _value -= v;
00303         T newv = _value;
00304         _lock.unset();
00305 
00306         return newv;
00307     }
00308 
00309     /* postfix operator */
00310     T operator ++(int)
00311     {
00312         _lock.set();
00313         T oldv = _value;
00314         ++_value;
00315         _lock.unset();
00316         
00317         return oldv;
00318     }
00319 
00320     /* postfix operator */
00321     T operator --(int)
00322     {
00323         _lock.set();
00324         T oldv = _value;
00325         --_value;
00326         _lock.unset();
00327 
00328         return oldv;
00329     }
00330 
00331 private:
00332     T    _value;
00333     Lock _lock;
00334 };
00335 #endif
00336 typedef Atomic< long long > a_int64_t;
00337 typedef Atomic< long > a_int32_t;
00338 typedef Atomic< bool > a_bool_t;
00339 }
